title: 115_s1722
content: The Act titled "True Reciprocity Investment Act of 2017" considers reciprocity of foreign investment. Section 721 of the Defense Production Act of 1950 is amended to include a provision for the United States Trade Representative to submit an annual report on the reciprocity of foreign investment, in consultation with the Secretary of Commerce and the Secretary of the Treasury. The report required by Section 721 of the Defense Production Act of 1950 includes a description, comparison, and assessment of laws, policies, and practices of major trading partners regarding foreign investment, specifically focusing on prohibitions, restrictions, and delays for investment by United States persons. The report required by Section 721 of the Defense Production Act of 1950 analyzes the impact of laws, policies, and practices on investment by United States persons in a specific country. It includes identifying affected industries, assessing transparency, evaluating compliance with bilateral investment treaties, and providing recommendations for facilitating investment. The report required by Section 721 of the Defense Production Act of 1950 assesses greenfield investment in the United States by countries, determining if they have high barriers to investment by United States persons. The report required by Section 721 of the Defense Production Act of 1950 assesses greenfield investment in the United States by countries, determining if they have high barriers to investment by United States persons. The report includes recommendations for countries to be designated as 'watch countries' or 'monitor countries' based on their investment laws, policies, and practices. If the Committee recommends not suspending or prohibiting a covered transaction with high barrier countries, they must provide an explanation for their decision. The transaction is subject to this subparagraph if a party is from a high barrier country. Definitions include the appropriate congressional committees from the Senate and House. The curr_chunk discusses definitions related to foreign investment in the United States, including the terms 'greenfield investment' and 'United States person'. The curr_chunk defines a 'United States person' as an entity within the United States, including a foreign branch. SEC. 3. CONSIDERATION OF REPORT ON RECIPROCITY. Section 721(f) of the Defense Production Act of 1950 is amended to redesignate paragraphs and subclauses, moving them to the right. Section 721(f) of the Defense Production Act of 1950 is amended by redesignating subparagraphs and adding new considerations based on national security requirements.
